row.scheme: (Doublestroke #f (cons "Voice one preset" d-VoicePreset1) ;1 (cons "Voice two preset" d-VoicePreset2) ;2 (cons "Voice three preset" d-VoicePreset3) ;3 (cons "Voice four preset" d-VoicePreset4) ;4 (cons "Automatic voice or single voice" d-VoicePresetAutomatic) ;5 )
row._tooltip: Choose a preset for four voices or automatic voice.
